title: 367.32 APPLICABLE LAW; SAME RIGHTS, LIABILITIES, PROCEEDINGS.
text:
All laws applicable to a town before adoption of an option and consistent with the option shall govern the town after adoption of an option.
Any ordinance or resolution in effect at the time of adoption of an option shall continue in effect until amended or repealed, notwithstanding the adoption of the option.
No valid and legally subsisting right or liability and no judicial proceeding shall be affected by a change in the form of town government unless otherwise provided.
